live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve it. Thank you for your patience.
Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
46776.summary: Some customers located between Michipicoten to Wawa are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
46776.title: Feb 15 - From Michipicoten to Wawa | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
